functionDecorators.name: liquidationCall
functionDecorators.description: users can invoke this function to liquidate an undercollateralized position.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the principal reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: _purchaseAmount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of principal that the liquidator wants to repay.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiveAToken
parameterDecorators.description: true if the liquidators wants to receive the aTokens, false if he wants to receive the underlying asset directly*.

functionDecorators.name: getReserveConfigurationData
functionDecorators.description: accessory functions to fetch data from the core contract*.

functionDecorators.name: swapBorrowRateMode
functionDecorators.description: borrowers can user this function to swap between stable and variable borrow rate modes.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reserve on which the user borrowed*.

functionDecorators.name: setUserUseReserveAsCollateral
functionDecorators.description: allows depositors to enable or disable a specific deposit as collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _useAsCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: true if the user wants to user the deposit as collateral, false otherwise.*.

functionDecorators.name: flashLoan
functionDecorators.description: allows smartcontracts to access the liquidity of the pool within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned. NOTE There are security concerns for developers of flashloan receiver contracts that must be kept into consideration. For further details please visit https://developers.aave.com.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contract receiving the funds. The receiver should implement the IFlashLoanReceiver interface.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the principal reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount requested for this flashloan*.

functionDecorators.name: redeemUnderlying
functionDecorators.description: Redeems the underlying amount of assets requested by _user. This function is executed by the overlying aToken contract in response to a redeem action.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the user performing the action.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the underlying amount to be redeemed*.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: this function is invoked by the proxy contract when the LendingPool contract is added to the AddressesProvider.

parameterDecorators.name: _addressesProvider
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the LendingPoolAddressesProvider registry*.

functionDecorators.name: borrow
functionDecorators.description: Allows users to borrow a specific amount of the reserve currency, provided that the borrower already deposited enough collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount to be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _interestRateMode
parameterDecorators.description: the interest rate mode at which the user wants to borrow. Can be 0 (STABLE) or 1 (VARIABLE)*.

functionDecorators.name: rebalanceStableBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: rebalances the stable interest rate of a user if current liquidity rate > user stable rate. this is regulated by Aave to ensure that the protocol is not abused, and the user is paying a fair rate. Anyone can call this function though.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the user to be rebalanced*.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: deposits The underlying asset into the reserve. A corresponding amount of the overlying asset (aTokens) is minted.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserve
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: integrators are assigned a referral code and can potentially receive rewards.*.
